Accounts Officer Job at Sunrose Consulting Limited




        
    

        
        Sunrose Consulting Limited - Our client represents a major manufacturer of fragrance chemicals used in the production of cosmetics. The manufacturer is based in Europe.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accounts Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Reporting to the Accountant, you will provide support in finance and accounting functions.
	You will assist in maintaining the books of accounts of the company and prepare financial statements and generate other operating reports.
	You will be responsible for tracking daily, weekly and monthly inventory.
	You will generate and analyse inventory reports to make sure there are no discrepancies.
	In addition, you will ensure accuracy of inventory reports, lead physical inventory counts and diagnose the cause of inventory variance.
	You will also assist with internal audits.


Requirements


	Degree-qualified, you must have a minimum of 2 years of post qualification requisite experience.
	This position requires a highly proactive individual with a first rate technical expertise gained within a rapidly changing business environment.
	Highly numerate and analytical with a practical approach to problem solving, you must have the drive and commercial acumen to succeed.
	A good knowledge of an accounting software is required.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Application Letter to: info@sunroseconsulting.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Health, Safety, and Environment (HSE) Officer",
  "description": "Migliore Construczione &amp; Tecniche Limited is a construction company founded on the belief that only the best can deliver buildings, roads, bridges and other infrastructural structures for their intended uses and purposes. The company was founded and currently runs on the principles of six sigma quality management approach with emphasis on what is critical to individual client satisfaction. At MC&amp;T, we believe that today&rsquo;s competitive environment leaves no room for error.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Health, Safety, and Environment (HSE) Officer
Job Locations:&nbsp;Ilorin - Kwara &amp; Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Incident investigation and reporting.
	Hazard identification and risk assessment.
	Emergency preparedness and response.
	Workplace inspection.
	Implementation of company HSE policies, protocols and regulations as applicable to the industry.
	Induction training, daily toolbox talk.
	Weekly and monthly HSE reports.


Education and Qualification


	Minimum of 2 years of experience in the same role, preferably within the construction, manufacturing, oil &amp; gas, or industrial sector.
	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in environmental science, Occupational Health and Safety, Engineering, or a related field.
	Demonstrated experience in developing and implementing health and safety policies and procedures.
	Professional HSE certification such as NEBOSH, IOSH, ISPON, or equivalent is required.
	Additional certifications in First Aid, Fire Safety, or Risk Assessment are an added advantage.


Knowledge &amp; Skills:


	Strong understanding of HSE regulations, risk management, and environmental compliance standards.
	Proficient in conducting safety inspections, incident investigations, and root cause analysis.
	Ability to identify potential hazards and recommend practical, effective preventive measures.
	Good report-writing and documentation skills.
	Excellent communication, coordination, and interpersonal skills.
	Strong observation, analytical, and problem-solving abilities.
	Proficient in MS Office tools and safety management software (where applicable).


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;recruitment@mcandt.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

        Migliore Construczione & Tecniche Limited is a construction company founded on the belief that only the best can deliver buildings, roads, bridges and other infrastructural structures for their intended uses and purposes. The company was founded and currently runs on the principles of six sigma quality management approach with emphasis on what is critical to individual client satisfaction. At MC&T, we believe that today’s competitive environment leaves no room for error.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Health, Safety, and Environment (HSE) Officer
Job Locations: Ilorin - Kwara & Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities

	Incident investigation and reporting.

	Weekly and monthly HSE reports.

	Minimum of 2 years of experience in the same role, preferably within the construction, manufacturing, oil & gas, or industrial sector.

Knowledge & Skills:

	Our jobs aren’t just about giving guests a smooth check-in and check-out. Instead, we want to build and experience that is memorable and unique. Our Guest Experience Experts take the initiative to deliver a wide range of services that guide guests through their entire stay.
